org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.web

Class WebHdfsFileSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      • org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem
        • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.web.WebHdfsFileSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.fs.DelegationTokenRenewer.Renewable, TokenAspect.TokenManagementDelegator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SWebHdfsFileSystem

    public class WebHdfsFileSystem
extends org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem
implements org.apache.hadoop.fs.DelegationTokenRenewer.Renewable, TokenAspect.TokenManagementDelegator
    A FileSystem for HDFS over the web.

      Abstract base class to handle path-based operations with params

      This class is for initialing a HTTP connection, connecting to server, obtaining a response, and also handling retry on failures.

      Handle path-based operations with json boolean response

      Handle create/append output streams

      Handle path-based operations with a json response

      Default path-based implementation expects no json response

      • resolveNNAddr

        private InetSocketAddress[] resolveNNAddr()
                                   throws IOException
        Resolve an HDFS URL into real INetSocketAddress. It works like a DNS resolver when the URL points to an non-HA cluster. When the URL points to an HA cluster with its logical name, the resolver further resolves the logical name(i.e., the authority in the URL) into real namenode addresses.
        Throws:
        IOException
